sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for April 27 - 28

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: The exit ramp from outer loop New Circle Rd to outbound Newtown Pike will be closed for construction.

day: Ramp and Lane Closures Scheduled for New Circle Rd at Newtown Pike:
event: The outer loop right lane will also be closed.  Signed detours for interstate access will be in place.
